summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 2505, for the improvement of Dearborn Street from 7th Avenue South to a point 750 feet west of Rainier Avenue, all in the City of Seattle, by paving the same with vitrified brick or some other suitable material laid upon a proper concrete foundation; with granite curbs and the construction of concrete sidewalks, under Ordinance No. 28438 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
